title: Hydrothermal synthesis of B, S, and N-doped carbon quantum dots for colorimetric sensing of heavy metal ions
content:

Aysenur Aygun, Ipek Cobas, Rima Nour Elhouda Tiri, Fatih Sen
CQDs were synthesized using glucose as the C source, and N-CQDs, B-CQDs, and S-CQDs were synthesized by doping with N, B, and S atoms. The colorimetric sensor properties of the synthesized CQDs for the detection of heavy metals were examined.
